subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick and Lleyton Hewitt will miss next week’s Madrid Masters because of leg injuries. Roddick withdrew because of a knee injury, organizers said yesterday. Hewitt has an ankle injury.
snippet: Andy Roddick and Lleyton Hewitt will miss next week’s Madrid Masters because of leg injuries. Roddick withdrew because of a knee injury, organizers said yesterday. Hewitt has an ankle injury.
